channel.title: Real quick..good server owner should easily solve
channel.description:
lmao i doing good on my server...but im bored of only getting stats to lvl 100...where can i find the file to allow me to change this? (too like 150 or summets)
ty to any1 hu helps

item.title: Real quick..good server owner should easily solve
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 14391160) return 100; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0; }

Look for that in player.java and change it up.

OFFTOPIC: You are calling yourself a noob if you cannot figure this out yourself.

real quick..good server owner should easily solve..

Read full topic
